Description.Text: The fully equipped apartments and rooms provide bathroom, a/c, refrigerator, free access to wireless internet, TFT LCD TV set, playstation 2, dvd player και free DVD-movies, hi-fi stereo with tuner, cooker or mini-bar including all necessary pods, telephone, safe deposit box, iron and ironing board, hair dryer, bathrobes and first-aid kit.
Important places/monuments close to the hotel: Beach -120m, Ermoupoli Town -10km.
